clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Processed Tomato Products on CVD Risks
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Processed Tomatoes on Endothelium- and Platelet- Function

brief_summary.textblock: The primary working hypothesis is that consuming processed tomatoes frequently/daily will favorably improve endothelium and platelet function disease-risk biomarker profiles in adult men and women compared to consuming no or relatively low amounts of processed tomatoes.

arm_group.description: Non-tomato products (i.e. teriyaki marinade, sprite, applesauce) to be consumed daily in replace of tomato products

intervention.description: Specified amounts of tomato products (i.e. tomato juice, ketchup, salsa, tomato soup, spaghetti sauce) to be consumed daily during a 6 week intervention phase.
